If you can consistently reproduce this we could check a couple of things tomorrow.

The error itself implies that something has unloaded the plugin that provides that type (except it's org.eclipse.ui.tests :-) or deliberately undefined the ParameterType (which seems odd).

I'll dig further.

PW
